channel.title: ALl people connecting to my ''LAN IP''?
channel.description:
Hello, Moparscape Players.
I have a question, Why does all people connecting to my ''LAN IP'' ? I made a other server, wich can be 1 player per 1ip. But every1 is using my ''LAN IP'' So only [b]ONE[/b] guy can play. How do i fix this?
I did go to '192.168.0.1' . I did go to ''Portforwarding'''And i done it -> Working good I did go to ''Virtual Server'' And i done it -> Working good. But every1 connecting to my LAN IP.
Thanks Why :confused:
I D D S I

item.title: ALl people connecting to my ''LAN IP''?
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

Hello, Moparscape Players.

I have a question, Why does all people connecting to my ‘‘LAN IP’’ ?
I made a other server, wich can be 1 player per 1ip.
But every1 is using my ‘‘LAN IP’’
So only ONE guy can play.
How do i fix this?

I did go to ‘192.168.0.1’ .
I did go to ‘‘Portforwarding’’'And i done it -> Working good
I did go to ‘‘Virtual Server’’ And i done it -> Working good.
But every1 connecting to my LAN IP.

Thanks
Why

I D D S I

Read full topic
item.source: ALl people connecting to my ''LAN IP''?
